# VioVietnamese

> A comprehensive Vietnamese language learning platform featuring interactive flashcards, AI-powered voice practice, structured lessons, and personalized learning paths to help learners master Vietnamese effectively.

VioVietnamese is a modern web application built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. It provides an immersive learning experience through flashcards, voice practice with AI, structured lessons organized by topics, and comprehensive learning statistics.

## Documentation

- [Next.js Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs): Complete guide to Next.js framework features and API
- [React Documentation](https://react.dev): Official React documentation and guides
- [TypeScript Documentation](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/): TypeScript language reference and handbook
- [Supabase Documentation](https://supabase.com/docs): Backend-as-a-Service platform documentation for authentication and database
- [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs): Utility-first CSS framework documentation

## Architecture

- [Project Structure](https://github.com/ngmtri20901/frontend-viovietnamese): Monorepo structure with frontend application in `/frontend` directory
- [App Router](https://nextjs.org/docs/app): Next.js App Router implementation with route groups `(public)` and `(app)`
- [Feature Modules](https://github.com/ngmtri20901/frontend-viovietnamese/tree/main/frontend/features): Organized feature modules including flashcards, AI voice, and learning modules
- [Shared Components](https://github.com/ngmtri20901/frontend-viovietnamese/tree/main/frontend/shared): Reusable UI components, utilities, and layout components

## Features

- [Flashcards System](https://github.com/ngmtri20901/frontend-viovietnamese/tree/main/frontend/features/flashcards): Interactive flashcard creation, review sessions, spaced repetition, and statistics tracking
- [AI Voice Practice](https://github.com/ngmtri20901/frontend-viovietnamese/tree/main/frontend/app/(app)/ai/voice): AI-powered voice examination and speaking practice with feedback
- [Learning Modules](https://github.com/ngmtri20901/frontend-viovietnamese/tree/main/frontend/app/(app)/learn): Structured lessons organized by topics with exercises
- [AI Chat](https://github.com/ngmtri20901/frontend-viovietnamese/tree/main/frontend/app/(app)/ai/chat): Conversational AI assistant for language learning support


## UI Components

- [Radix UI Components](https://www.radix-ui.com/docs): Accessible component primitives used throughout the application
- [Lucide Icons](https://lucide.dev): Icon library for consistent iconography
- [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com): Utility-first CSS for styling

## Routes

- Public Routes: `/`, `/plans`, `/blog`, `/contact`
- Authentication: `/auth/login`, `/auth/sign-up`, `/auth/forgot-password`
- Learning: `/learn`, `/learn/[topicSlug]`, `/learn/[topicSlug]/[lessonSlug]`
- Flashcards: `/flashcards`, `/flashcards/topic/[topicID]`, `/flashcards/review`, `/flashcards/create`
- AI Features: `/ai/voice`, `/ai/voice/speak`, `/ai/voice/exam`, `/ai/chat`
- Shop: `/shop`
